PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE ROBERT F. FERGUSON, Chief Judge of the Family Court for the Province of Nova Scotia, as Associate Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia (Family Division), and as a Judge ex officio of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal, effective March 30, 1999.
